description: The Odessa American app is a must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all the Permian Basin has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with the official companion to the Odessa American, the daily newspaper for Odessa and the Permian Basin, Texas. Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted writers. Access local news stories plus sports, entertainment, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our App spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter.
